gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata - Part 2: Extensions for Imagery and Gridded Data

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This data set contains the Coordinated Energy and Water Cycle Observation Project (CEOP) CEOP_AP Himalayas Hourly Flux Data Set. This data set contains hourly data from the Pyramid station in the CEOP_AP Himalayas reference site for the period, 1 October 2002 through 31 December 2009. This data set contains both ASCII data and netCDF data. The ASCII data file covers the entire time period for all stations. The netCDF data file covers the entire time period with one netCDF file for each station.

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: NetCDF: Network Common Data Form for CEOP (application/x-netcdf)

gmd:keyword.gco:CharacterString: EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSPHERE > ATMOSPHERIC CHEMISTRY > CARBON AND HYDROCARBON COMPOUNDS > ATMOSPHERIC CARBON DIOXIDE
EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSPHERE > ATMOSPHERIC RADIATION > HEAT FLUX
EARTH SCIENCE > LAND SURFACE > SOILS > SOIL HEAT BUDGET
